Package edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.games.dealer

The package of the actual game, contains both command line version and GUI version.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BlackJackGame
    This class contains the main component(procedure) of a black jack game.
    BlackJackGui
    The Gui version of the game BlackJackGui
    BlackJackHouse
    The dealer / house of the game.
    BlackJackMain
    The console version of the game BlackJack
    BlackJackPlayer
    The player of the game.
    Card
    This class represents an individual card in a standard 52 card deck
    Dealer
    This class is used to deal cards to the user.
    DealerPanelHelper
    This class is used to help the Panel create the string of random cards that it displays.
    Deck
    This class is to provide functions to a standard 52 cards deck such as shuffling.
    GamesDealerGui
    SimpleGui for our Games Dealer application
    GamesDealerPanel
    GamesDealerPanel GUI for games-dealer project
    Hand
    This class is used to add cards to the hand.
    Main  
    MainGui
    Main menu to select the game you want to play
    SoundEffect
    This class is used to play a sound effect.
